mapper.select: select p.party_no as party_no, p.name as name, mb.name as member_name, p.register_date as register_date, pc.status as status from party as p join party_user as u on p.party_no = u.party_no and u.party_maker = '1' join member as mb on u.users_no = mb.member_no left outer join party_claim as pc on p.party_no = pc.party_no order by p.party_no asc
select p.party_no, location_no, name, content, start_date, end_date, max_member, in_out_ex from party where party_no=#{no}
mapper.update: update party set location_no=#{locationNo}, name=#{name}, content=#{content}, start_date=#{startDate}, end_date=#{endDate}, max_member=#{maxMember}, in_out_ex=#{inOutEx} where party_no=#{no}
